thread.title: Xabi Alonso reveals he could have joined Arsenal…….if they would have paid another £3million for him
thread.title_full: Xabi Alonso reveals he could have joined Arsenal…….if they would have paid another £3million for him

author: whaughton
title: Xabi Alonso reveals he could have joined Arsenal…….if they would have paid another £3million for him
text:
Could have and should have Xabi Alonso reveals he could have joined Arsenal…….if they would have paid another £3million for him 
Liverpool boss Rafa Benitez was prepared to ditch the Spaniard for Aston Villa skipper Gareth Barry but Arsenal added Xabi Alonso to a long list of stars the club have failed to bag by Warren Haughton 26th March 2017, 4:10 pm Updated: 26th March 2017, 4:14 pm
